message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $12,000.  Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Let me know what you think!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, and I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to get at least $10,500 to make this worthwhile for me.  Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down a bit more. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $10,250. I hope we can come to an agreement.
